about_the_game:
“Who controls the past controls the future. Who controls the present controls the past.”
(George Orwell, 1984)

Liberated: Glory To The Heroes is the second of two short story addons for Liberated.
Witness the dramatic aftermath of the game’s finale in this action-driven DLC chapter. Heroes fall and the lines between good and evil blur further in this unrelenting battle for the greater good.

Media on Liberated:
"Looks like a noir graphic novel come to life" - Game Informer
"There’s really something magical here" - PC Invasion
"The story has echoes of Watchmen" - PC Gamer
“Blends noir comic art style with Inside-style-gameplay” - Polygon
“Feels like an episode of Black Mirror” - The Sartorial Geek



Liberated is an action-adventure game inside a living, hand-drawn comic book. Uncover an alarmingly current cyberpunk reality where human rights are dying away. Take up arms and solve puzzles in a noir rain-soaked city that’s desperate for justice.
Seamlessly merging the art of hand-drawn graphic novels with interactivity and side-scrolling action, it’s a revolutionary combination of video games and comics.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 or Intel Core i3 (3.0 GHz or higher)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon R7 370 or equivalent with 2 GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: The game requires a 64-bit CPU and Operating System.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 or Intel Core i5 (3.2 GHz or higher)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon RX 580 or equivalent with 4 GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: The game requires a 64-bit CPU and Operating System.
